parameters: Read the explanation on Unelma's Ultimate Trial?
Unelma's Ultimate Trial has specific rules──
You must follow those rules to win the battle.
\C[17]・Assembled Party members for each battle is limited
\C[17]・Party members are fully healed after battle
・TP becomes maximum at the start of every battle\C[0]
Only the following monsters can challenge the next trial.
\C[17]・Fiede, Dog, Fiend, Dragon, Succubus, Snow Woman,
Slime, Little Barbarian, Harpy, Snake Woman\C[0]
Some monsters in the party cannot be used.
パーティ編成画面の表示
Only the following monsters can challenge the next trial.
Chimera, Shadow, Mushroom, Ninja Owl, Spinner\C[0]
Some monsters in the party cannot be used.
パーティ編成画面の表示
Only the following monsters can challenge the next trial.
\C[17]・Fiede, Dog, Discarded Doll, Shark, Great Succubus,
Scylla, Demon Dog, Flower Fairy, Archenemy, Ghost\C[0]
Some monsters in the party cannot be used.
パーティ編成画面の表示
Only the following monsters can challenge the next trial.
\C[17]・Fiede, Dog, Murder Maiden, Oil, Magician, Flame Spirit,
Some monsters in the party cannot be used.
パーティ編成画面の表示
Only the following monsters can challenge the next trial.
Slime, Demon Dog, Little Barbarian, Ant Queen\C[0]
Some monsters in the party cannot be used.
A required party member is not in the party.
パーティ編成画面の表示
Would you like to take on another challenge?
Further trials will not fully recover your party,
and you cannot open your menu during the challenge
Party formation during the challenge is done automatically
and is reorganized after a certain amount of progress.
Full recovery and TP gain is provided at this time.
You do not return to your original location after
each battle. If you lose or abort the challenge,
However, after a certain number of wins, you will be
moved to a special map where you can only Save.
It's a hole in a tree.
To think the first to arrive at the journey's end
would be the Lord of Reason.
I am that which belongs on this planet.
Before you even arrived, Lord of Reason.
You called me a Lord of Reason...
No. However, it can only be said that
that title and I have a deep relationship.
I don't get it, but can you please
just get your ass out here?
You're the kinda person who spouts nonsense
and expects people to understand them.
Are you saying this place is the journey's end?
And you're going along with that?
For a visit from a traveler,
with naught but just a feeling.
In the process, the inside of me become my own self.
And that is also why my thoughts took shape,
and then vanished in an instant...
Are you willing to take the ultimate trial?
If we clear it, then Unelma's treasure
will be in our grasp, correct?
If we hang out with riddle-person,
you must not lend your strength.
You too have a right to take the trial.
However, you must not assist the residents
of your Star for this journey.
I think I can understand it.
The meaning behind this person's words.
Then, according to the principle of the trials──
Didn't that voice say no already?
I can't help you guys out.
But nothing says I can't tag along.
W-well, if it doesn't work out,
we'll be warned of it later.
\C[17]Ultimate Trial\C[0] has been added to the Event List.
We're back to where we started.
Prepare yourself and take on the next challenge.
So it's the type where it gets harder every time.
Will I come back again if I win next time?
How many times is enough, then?
It depends── Well, this is the first time.
You can change the contents of this trial
In any case, we just need four more wins.
Please add Luora in the next time we do this...
If we win two more, we'll complete this trial.
As expected from Ino and friends!
That was just testing the waters──
Up next is the real deal.
I'd at least like to have your name.
Are you Unelma's Treasure, or something?
shouldn't you have gone with something
To think we'd have to fight Luora here.
We almost got in trouble because
This is the essence of the Trial.
Nothing is impossible within its domain.
I'm sort of worried about what could be
stronger than the last fight, though...
Woof will do her very best!
You guys seem to be having fun, huh.
